name: INDESTCOIN
description: INTDESTCOIN (Symbol: INTD) is a revolutionary digital ecosystem designed to validate any form of digital content globally. Spearheaded by INTDEST TECH, our project is part of a larger initiative that includes 30 supporting projects under the banner of INTDEST Services. Our utility token, INTD, plays a pivotal role in INTDEST Services' financial ecosystem and holds tremendous growth potential. Key Features: DEX Aggregator: Providing users with optimal rates by examining various liquidity pools. Limit Order Protocol: Enhancing DeFi order swap capabilities with dynamic pricing and conditional orders. INTD Wallet: A user-friendly, multichain wallet for storing, transacting, and staking tokens. NFT: We have a big marketplace for our NFT project called INTGAL. Future Plans: We are actively developing our proprietary blockchain, XCHAIN, and plan to launch a test version soon. Wallets in which we are officially listed: coinbase, BINANCE, Bitget, TrustWallet INTD BANK - INTD Crypto Card - INTAI - INTGAL Project
